description: This program creates a surface by tessellating a given input volume.

input_volume.title: Input volume
input_volume.description: Input volume (e.g., a filled MRI image).

label_value.title: Label value
label_value.description: Label value for the tessellation. Integer value, if input is filled volume, 127 is rh, 255 is lh.

output_surf.title: Output surface
output_surf.description: Binary surface of the tessellation, output file.

different_labels.title: Different labels flag
different_labels.description: Tessellate the surface of all voxels with different labels.

max_vertices.title: Max vertices
max_vertices.description: Set the max number of vertices to nvertices, and the max number of faces to (2 * nvertices).

real_ras.title: Real RAS flag
real_ras.description: Save surface with real RAS coordinates where c_(r,a,s) != 0.
